Package org.netbeans.spi.actions

Contains support classes for easier implementation of Context Interfaces.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSavable
    Default implementation of Savable interface and additional contracts, including dealing with Savable.REGISTRY.

Package org.netbeans.spi.actions Description

Contains support classes for easier implementation of Context Interfaces.
